summary: This mod will add a new city to the game
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a new city AmberLight near Whiterun, it will add new factions for AmberLight gaurds, Heros guild. This mod will add new weapns like the new AmberLight gaurd sword. This mod is a WIP it will have updates just about every week until done. 


V 1.1 New City AmberLight started, new NPC Athena Grace in Dragonreach, 1 building finish the inside needs work. 5 guards finished, not much in the city as of yet. Working on building 2 now.

V 1.2 Fixed the Nav Mesh in and around the city of AmberLight.

V 1.3 Fixed lighting, fixed Nav Mesh for building #1, new merchant added to AmberLight, GrimReaper4d added to AmberLight he will let you know what the city will become.
author: grimreaper4d
